properties.areaDesc: Michigan City IN to New Buffalo MI; New Buffalo MI to St Joseph MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 13 at 3:30PM EST until January 14 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a
Small Craft Advisory, which is in effect from 1 PM to 10 PM EST
Tuesday.

* WINDS...Southwest 15 to 20 knots. Gusts to 25 knots.

* WAVES...2 to 4 feet.
properties.instruction:
A small craft advisory means that sustained winds or frequent
gusts of 22 to 33 knots are likely...and/or waves greater than
4 feet are expected. Inexperienced mariners...especially those
operating smaller vessels should avoid navigating in these
conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 10 PM EST TUESDAY
